name: Snail Away
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 38

Snails are slow. So why not glide around under a leaf?

Enjoy a relaxing journey as you fly around avoiding obstacles.

W A S D - movement

I ran out of time to add more variety to the generation, but this was my second LD (first completed Compo game) and my first 3D Unity game. Thanks for playing!

//

Link to Ludum Dare Entry:

--> https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/snail-away <--
